job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongMaven is building the university of the future  empowering the worlds creators to offer cohortbased courses directly to their audiences Courses on Maven have community at their core focus on active learning and are available anywhere in the worldbrbrOur team has raised 25 million from incredible investors including Andreessen Horowitz First Round Naval and Arlan Hamilton and weve launched soldout courses with instructors like Li Jin Anthony Pompliano Lenny Rachitsky and Sahil LavingiabrbrWere the leading player in a massive and growing market but are still early enough for you to make a big impact Join usbrbrThe RolebrbrYou will be one of the first 10 engineers at the company owning features endtoend becoming an expert on parts of our product and building the platform that powers the best cohortbasedcourses on the marketbrbrstrongYou Willstrong ulliBe one of the first 10 engineers on our teamliliOwn features endtoendliullieg payments emails live sessions community analytics internal toolsliulliCollaborate with engineers designers and others across the teamliliWork fullstack with Typescript React Nextjs Python FastAPI Postgres and AWS Aurora ECS Elasticache Github Actions amp VercelliliBe an influential part of building a worldclass online learning platform brbrliulstrongYou Havestrong ulliShipped features in production apps with real usersliliExperience with fullstack developmentliulliJavascriptTypescript frontend frameworks preferably React  open to other technologies such as Angular Vue Redux liliAPI development on the backend preferably Python  open to other technologies such as Ruby Go PHP JavaliulliJudgement around when to do something quickly and when to build for the long termliliProduct instincts and a keen eye for why users want what they wantliliA desire to strengthen those around youbrbrliulIf you dont meet these criteria but are still excited about Maven reach out anyway  wed love to hear from youbrbrstrongOur CulturebrbrstrongWere growing quickly but were still a startup and youll have the opportunity to shape how we work So far weve looked for teammates whobrulliAre hungry to learn and can give and receive egofree feedbackliliTake pride in doing great work and in helping others do the sameliliValue clear thinking and open communicationliliDont just solve problems  they seek them out take ownership of the solution and see it through from idea to executionliliAre willing to throw away ideas and are optimistic enough to keep hunting for new onesliliThink 8020 and focus on getting the right stuff done not the most stuff possiblebrbrliulCome Build With UsbrbrWere a fully remote company with employees in New York Toronto Austin the Bay Area and beyond Anyone within 1 hour of US time zones is welcome
